attributes.action: Stop the closure of Fleetwood's chemotherapy unit
attributes.additional_details: A decision has been taken to close the chemotherapy unit in Fleetwood, Lancashire.  This has been running for a year being funded by charity, but now they cannot afford to keep it open. The PCT will not take up the running so a brand new facility will be shut and many people at there most vulnerable and in very poor health will have to travel to the Blackpool unit which is already massively overstretched.
